#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline void scanint(long long int &x)
{
    register long long int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    long long int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,mm,i;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanint(n);
        scanint(mm);
        long long int a[mm];
        for(i=0;i<mm;i++)
            scanint(a[i]);
        long long int b=n-1,mb=n-1,c=1,mc=1,var;
        for(i=1;i<mm;i++)
        {
            var=a[i]-a[i-1];
            if(var!=0)
                c+=var;
            else
                c--;
            if(c<mc)
                mc=c;
        }
        mc=2-mc;
        b=n-mc;mb=n-mc;
        for(i=1;i<mm;i++)
        {
            var=a[i]-a[i-1];
            if(var!=0)
                b-=var;
            if(b<mb)
                mb=b;
        }
        if(mb<0||mc>n)
            printf("-1\n");
        else
            printf("%lld\n",mc);
    }
    return 0;
}
